@EmmaHowardBoyd @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK Please add more, and fast. And remember that it’s not just humans that swim in that water. If it’s not good enough for us it’s not good enough for other component species of the web of life we depend on in myriad and profound ways.

@FionasRedKite @EnvAgencySE Great....That was my understanding 😊

@CleanIlkley @markilk @EnvAgency @YorkshireWater @Alex_Ross_Shaw @bradfordmdc @_RobbieMoore @Addingham_Group Congratulations! 🍾 It’s amazing 🤩 Sooner rivers seen as public property as in New Zealand and kept clean and healthy for all, the better for the environment and for all of us Our waterways should never have become an industrial or agricultural dumping space

@EmmaHowardBoyd @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK Why do we have to wait until 2021 for this? Clean river water should be the norm and a priority for @EnvAgency all along. That @EmmaHowardBoyd trumpets this says all you need to know about the terrible job her agency has done for the last decade
